entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming east 20 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
